Reviews.Title: “a real surprise”
Reviews.Author: RenM188632
Reviews.Content: friendly staff, nice hotel room, very good beds, private parking garage, very good breakfastbuffet, near the centre, near the railway station,

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in Mataró”
Reviews.Author: JOSPIR89
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel several times during the last 4 years, for work reasons. It is located some 40 from Barcelona, by car. The hotel is clean and comfortable and the rooms are a good size. Good buffet breakfast, but limited evening meals in the bar. Even so they were individually well cooked. Staff is friendly and don´t worry about parking your car because there is places available on the streets nearby. Avoid, during the summer, the duplex rooms on the fourth floor, they are too hot.

Reviews.Title: “Quality hotel”
Reviews.Author: DavidLKnight
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the hotel for three nights in October 2011. It is located some 10 mins from the train station with regular trains into the centre of Barcelona. The hotel is clean and comfortable and the rooms are a good size. Good buffet breakfast, but limited evening meals in the bar. Even so they were individually well cooked. Staff were very friendly and helpful with ideas for our two days in Barcelona and when we reported a problem with the battery for the safe it was changed whilst we ate our breakfast. In house garage at a reasonable cost with free street parking.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel. Out of Town. Best Option in Mataro.”
Reviews.Author: podettski
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a week. Staff couldn't be nicer. Got a big room which was cleaned daily. As it was September nothing else in the hotel was open including pool at weekends. Restaurant was also closed. There was free wi-fi in the lobby but wi-fi is chargeable in your room. The hotel is not in town but is a 15 min walk to the train station and main area. I didn't see a nicer hotel in Mataro and you are a 15 min walk from the biggest beach in the town. It is in a quiet area so got a good sleep.

Reviews.Title: “45 minutes of train. Unfriendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: Lila2008
Reviews.Content: From the hotel to the train station it's a 10 minutes walk than 45 minutes of train to get to the center of Barcelona. Last train is at 00h15 from Place Catalunya if you want to come back this way. I would recommend something closer. Also the staff was unfriendly and not helpful, this may not seem important now but it can make a difference when you get there and have a bunch of questions to ask them about where to go or find a good restaurant, etc...

Reviews.Title: “decent hotel do not arrive hungry at weekends”
Reviews.Author: plantpage
Reviews.Content: Arrived at this hotel after ten hour drive from paris on a sunday tired and hungry delighted to find that despite no mention on hotel website there is no food or dri nk available at the weekend not even a cup of coffee or a beer only chap in hotel on reception offered to phone pizza place we agreed big mistake absolutely disgusting. Sewage smell in upstairs corridors shame really because the room was ok and the breakfast the following morning was ok unfortunately this couldnt make up for the total lack of service on arrival the previous night it says hotel over the door for goodness sake

Reviews.Title: “Good standard”
Reviews.Author: ambassadorger
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a good location for people who are in Mataro on business travel. Located right in the centre you can reach the hotel very quickly by car coming of the near by dual carriage way. A walk to the beach is only about 10 minutes away and therefore very pleasant if you intend to get a cold beer at one of the numerous restaurants and bars by the sea side. THe hotel also has a small pool and a gym which allows you to keep fit during your travels. I enjoyed my short stay. THanks

Reviews.Title: “Excellent alternative to Barcelona Hotels”
Reviews.Author: Paddy54
Reviews.Content: Located on a commuter rail line this spot offers the joys of a smaller town with easy rail access to Barcelona. 40 minutes travel; 6 Euros return. Many restaurants; clean beaches and a chance to laze about with the locals in the plazas. Staff fluent in English

Reviews.Title: “A true haven”
Reviews.Author: CharlotteNIreland
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, service just wonderful; staff couldn't do enough to help us. About 45 minutes in train from centre of Barcelona; just 3 Euros return, excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “splendid”
Reviews.Author: lolaborro
Reviews.Content: The Ciutat de Mataro was such a good choice for our stay. The location is not ideal as it is about 15 mins walk to the town's centre but its still central enought to get everywhere in Mataro. The rooms are comfortable and spacious, elegantly furnished and well equiped. Their staff are very friendly and helpful. We didn't try their breakfast because we found it a big expensive and there are so many cafes and bakeries nearby that we didn't see the point. The relationship quality - price was fabulous.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but not the best location”
Reviews.Author: suzie_21
Reviews.Content: Due to a last minute change of plan while on holiday we had to find a hotel that was reasonably close to barcelona but also not too far from girona airport, so we randomly chose this hotel without really checking out the town. I was certainly not disappointed with the hotel itself - the decor is very modern, the staff were friendly and the hotel was clean. The only drawback was that on arrival we were told that to access our room (which was on the second floor) we couldn't use the main lifts - so we had to go through the bar, up a flight of stairs (we had to lift our heavy cases) and along a corridor to find another (very small) lift that we could use. But the room itself was nice and has all the usual facilities. As for the location.......... Well, the hotel is in a very industrial part of the town and although it is only a couple of streets back from the beach you have to walk past multiple car dealerships, garages, warehouses, etc. which was fine during the day but not so nice late at night (we got the train back from barcelona pretty late and felt at bit uneasy walking back from the station, which is next to the beach - there were a few shady characters hanging around) It was easy enough to get to Barcelona (about half an hour on the train) but due to a problem with the trains (system failure at the station, nobody knew what train was going where, no staff in station, everybody jumping on a train to god-knows-where at the last minute and hoping for the best!) we were lucky to get back that night. If you need to stay in a mataro then I would definitely recommend this hotel, but if you are wanting to spend time in Barcelona I'd suggest you find somewhere a bit closer

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and value for money”
Reviews.Author: jp007
Reviews.Content: We came upon this hotel by chance and how lucky we were. Lovely foyer as one would expect but the bedroom was really excellent. Large, clean with substantial bathroom. What also was rather nice was there were quite a number of unexpected freebies and nice little extras - sweets, chocolates, lovely arrangement of soaps/sponge/toothbrush/toothpaste. TV with CNN being the only English channel. Very clean. Breakfast was excellent too with a vast assortment of fresh fruits, assorted cold meats, cereals, juices etc etc. Good value and thoroughly recommended.
